alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 11:58PM EDT until May 07 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River near Salyersville affecting Magoffin County. The next statement will be issued by 7 AM Saturday. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Licking River near Salyersville. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water inundates one lane of Kentucky Highway 1090 in a few places near Lakeville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 15.0 feet early Saturday morning. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
